name: The Musician's Laboratory
pages:
Research Notes #81

Today I was walking immersed in my thoughts, when I heard a melody in the distance. I approached and found an abandoned building, remarkably intact considering its presumed age.

Upon entering, the

melody I heard before repeated itself, but this time I noticed how certain note blocks no longer played, a real shame that it has deteriorated over time. I suppressed my annoyance at not having the musical skills to mark the notes and reconstruct the song.

Reading the owner's recent writings, he seemed like a very lonely man, who, isolated from society, had only the company of his music and... his sprite...? Who knows if it was there for him or for his music.

Now that I think about it, I've always been alone for most of my

life, and the only company I've had in recent years (excluding recent developments) has been that of my donkey. What does he feel about me? Is he attached to me or does he follow me only because it's in his nature to follow the course of the leash?
Uh, I'm not used to thinking too much about such trivial things; I'd better focus on something else.
